CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was appointed as deputy general manager of a ORG - owned company limited by shares .
CARDINAL . The applicant ’s employment was terminated by mutual agreement as of CARDINAL DATE . Under this agreement the applicant received severance payment , subject to payroll burdens .

CARDINAL . Under new legislation ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) the severance payment was subsequently taxed at a PERCENT rate in its part exceeding MONEY ( ORG ) ; the income tax and social security contributions already paid ( see paragraph CARDINAL above ) were deducted from the tax payable . Thus , the applicant paid an additional ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( approximately FAC euros ( ORG ) ) in special tax on DATE .
